title: How deepfake scams are fueling a new wave of fraud
description: Scammers are using deepfake technology to replicate your child's voice in a kidnapping hoax, catfish with AI-generated video dates, and impersonate executives to steal millions. Learn how to spot deepfake fraud, and use Avast Scam Guardian to help verify what…
content: AI deepfakes are making fraud even more sophisticated. Learn how to stay safe from deepfake scams.Scammers are using deepfake technology to replicate your child's voice in a kidnapping hoax, catfish … [+6216 chars]
